item.title: Brand new blog
item.description: Setting up new blog with Github and Golang

item.title: New Year New Blog
item.description: 2020 has been a very special and challenging year. By working remotely throughout the year, a lot of thing has been changed such as new working environment, new projects, and most importantly new work-life balance. I am very lucky to find this work very well myself. Not only I can work much more productive, but also have chance to take a pause to think out of the box. I found myself more outgoing and enjoy sharing my knowledge and experience.
